channel.title: Music and idiot neighbors
channel.description:
I have so many problems with them. I don't really know what to do to them.
Until recently I used my Edifier S730D system, 10" subwoofer. 2x75W satellites + 200W subwoofer (I managed to get a more powerful revision of it). Well, they complained a lot because of this one, got threatened with the police and so on, but nothing too bad.
Now I got a new system and it has just got insane. My neighbors aren't letting me relax at all, they're calling the police all the time.
My new system is: 2 x Cerwin Vega XLS 215 - 2 x 500W RMS - Floorstanding loudspeakers 1 x Cerwin Vega CVHF-A21S - 1 x 1200W RMS - Subwoofer
XLS 215 [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gxv9tBMPJ3k[/youtube]
CVHF-A21S [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lqJoPZvnTQg[/youtube]
Until now I've handled the police by switching to classical music as soon as I notice them coming. I just say that I don't know what the neighbors are talking about. They of course don't really believe me anymore. Last time I told them to come with an SPL meter if they wan't to charge me with anything.
So, really, what to do in this situation? I understand that it's important to notice other people around you and not disturb their peace, but I like loud music. I'm not going to move into the jungle, away from civilization. And this stress is getting on my nerves already, every time I enjoy my system I have to feel so fudgeing stressed that when is the police coming again.

item.title: Music and idiot neighbors
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

I knew this wasn’t going to go anywhere but I let it drag on for the lols. Your last comment wasn’t helping either…

Turn it down or continue to be the neighborhood Dennis.

Read full topic

Yeah dude, you’re in the wrong.

item.title: Music and idiot neighbors
item.dc:creator: @asyo4 asyo4
item.description:
@asyo4 wrote:

If I were your neighbors I would call the cops too. I can honestly see that kind of shit being blasted 24/7 getting old & annoying.

Read full topic

All the time. Loud daytime, not so loud nighttime.
